title: Favourite 1980's Pop Group
content:
what is your favourite 1980's pop group?[url=http://www.ironmaiden.com][img]http://i11.photobucket.com/albums/a199/rorie1983/ironmaiden.jpg[/img][/url]

title: Hmm...
content:
There's too much classy stuff from the 80s to choose. I'm inclined toward Split Enz, but that Other option makes things complicated. Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

A concerned member of the Preservation of Endangered Spleens Society
